long_description: The rugged Gerber Bear Grylls Ultimate multitool earns its name with spring-loaded pliers, an external locking tool and an extra-grippy handle. A full quiver of components includes a fine-edge knife, serrated knife, saw, Phillips screwdriver, small and medium flat screwdrivers, wire cutter and scissors. Also features a lanyard ring, bottler opener and can opener. Ergonomic, textured rubber grip maximizes comfort and enhances control; spring-loaded jaw allows easy 1-handed use. Safe.T.Plus(TM) system enhances safety by locking components into position. Nylon sheath is light, tough and mildew-resistant. The Gerber Bear Grylls Ultimate multitool comes with land-to-air rescue instructions and 'Priorities of Survival' pocket guide containing Bear's survival essentials.
short_description: The rugged Gerber Bear Grylls Ultimate multitool earns its name with spring-loaded pliers, an external locking tool and an extra-grippy handle.
